title: The Latest Journal Opinions on Russia’s Invasion of Ukraine
sub_head: What it means, what comes next, and how the West should respond.
body: Vladimir Putin’s decision to invade Ukraine has ended the post-Cold War order and signaled a new and dangerous era in global affairs. In the links below, the Wall Street Editorial Page explains the crisis in Ukraine, what should be done in response, and what it means for the world and American interests.
